description: Detects suspicious reconnaissance command line activity on Windows systems using the PowerShell Get-LocalGroupMember Cmdlet
name: Suspicious Reconnaissance Activity Using Get-LocalGroupMember Cmdlet
query: process.command_line:*Get\-LocalGroupMember\ * AND (process.command_line:(*domain\ admins* OR *\ administrator* OR *\ administrateur* OR *enterprise\ admins* OR *Exchange\ Trusted\ Subsystem* OR *Remote\ Desktop\ Users* OR *Utilisateurs\ du\ Bureau\ Ã \ distance* OR *Usuarios\ de\ escritorio\ remoto*))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
